name: social-1
author: skyler
title: social media plz
body:
You can find me at the usual web haunts:

On Facebook, the den of iniquity that sometimes it is;

Tweeting sometimes, when the APIs for sharing social status updates across services work properly;

Linking it in if you're into rubbing elbows or can haz jobz;

And over on Google+ if I feel like it.

Drop me a line. Say hello.
